House of Damnation Video

House of Damnation

Welcome home

Are you ready to be terrified? Originally a backyard haunt, this brand-new trip to hell will mortify you from the moment you set foot inside.

Established in 2012, Revelations Haunted Attractions began as a gathering of family and friends. Today, House of Damnation is something beyond costumes and family fun. This haunted attraction will throw you onto thrill ride of excitement, as you delve into the world of the dead and depraved.

You will be sweating bullets upon entering. Let's see if you have what it takes to walk through the House of Damnation without succumbing to pure terror and dread.

See you there...

Vito's Pizza is providing free pizza every night, first-come first-served!
